article: Sea turtles have been on Earth for millions of years, but they may soon die out. The main _ to them is people who kill them for food, according to Dr. Wallace J. In the US, most people have never eaten turtle. This is because turtles are _ by the United States law, which makes it _ to harm or kill these amazing animals.
